title: üìú Founding Sons Gaming Community Guidelines
intro:
Welcome, brave adventurer! Before fully embarking on your gaming journey with us, please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our community guidelines. These rules are designed to ensure a respectful and enjoyable environment for all members. Your adherence to these principles is vital in maintaining the spirit of camaraderie within our ranks.

Below are the rules and expectations we uphold in Founding Sons Gaming Community:

rules.title: Respect for All
rules.description: Be respectful to everyone here. No harassment allowed. If you have an issue, try to resolve it maturely. If that doesn't work, reach out to an admin or moderator.

rules.title: Have Fun
rules.description: Your main goal is to enjoy yourself.

rules.title: Use the Right Channels
rules.description: Post your messages in the appropriate channels for organized discussions.

rules.title: Stay Connected
rules.description: While there's no set requirement, we appreciate it if you say "Hi" occasionally. Let's get to know each other!

rules.title: Play Your Way
rules.description: No need to be hardcore. Play the games you like, when you like.

outro:
Your compliance is appreciated and ensures a harmonious and enjoyable experience for all members.

**If you agree to abide by these rules and become an integral part of our gaming fellowship, please click the button below.**
